DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine superiority single dose intravenous ibuprofen compare acetaminophen treatment fever first two hour treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Efficacy , Pharmacokinetic Study Intravenous Ibuprofen Pediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine superiority single dose intravenous ibuprofen compare acetaminophen treatment fever measure area change temperature versus time curve first 2 hour treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have write informed consent provide legal parent , guardian , authorized agent prior participation study studyonly related procedure . 2 . Be birth ( 28 week < 40 week gestational age ) ≤ 16 year age . 3 . Have new ( less 7 day ) onset fever , document temperature great equal 101.0 ºF ( 38.3 ºC ) . 1 . Have inadequate intravenous access . 2 . Have receive antipyretic drug therapy within 2 hour dose . 3 . Have history allergy hypersensitivity NSAIDs aspirin . 4 . Have receive another investigational drug within past 30 day . 5 . Be otherwise unsuitable study , opinion Investigator . 6 . Have fever due hyperthermia . 7 . Pregnant nursing .
